question:
Considering the table Input as given below, display the table
 table Input = with
   [| as Car, as Color, as Price |]
   [| "Clio", "red" , 25000|]
   [| "Clio", "green" , 19000 |]
   [| "Megane", "yellow" , 20000 |]
   [| "Megane", "yellow" , 21000 |]
   [| "Megane", "black" , 27000 |]
   [| "Hummer", "gold" , 150000 |]
answer:
table Input = with
  [| as Car, as Color, as Price |]
  [| "Clio", "red" , 25000|]
  [| "Clio", "green" , 19000 |]
  [| "Megane", "yellow" , 20000 |]
  [| "Megane", "yellow" , 21000 |]
  [| "Megane", "black" , 27000 |]
  [| "Hummer", "gold" , 150000 |]

// display the 'Input' table with all its columns
show table "Input" with
  Input.Car
  Input.Color
  Input.Price {unit: "â‚¬"}
